text: New images have been revealed as the @EnvAgency looks to have plans approved in the coming weeks for £47m worth of flood defence improvements in Preston and South Ribble. Read: https://t.co/jXNwv68zLf https://t.co/AE03iS5DTV

It’s #FloodActionWeek there’s some simple things you can do to prepare for flooding. Knowing what to do in a flood could help keep you &your family safe, visit @EnvAgency & find out how to sign up for #Flood warnings https://t.co/wwS1cLftrY https://t.co/urGfgtA8O3
